title: How to write a research article - Quora

response.answer_text: Write a proper hypothesis that you can actually test against. Spend a very long time doing your actual research thoroughly. Spend almost as long analysing your results from every possible angle. Be open to the fact that the results might not be what you are expecting, or in line with any ideology you might have. Write your method; results; discussion; conclusion; introduction; precis, in that order. Include everything. Reference everything. Identify and remove any bias, conscious or otherwise, that you might have. Get it published. Have it either accepted by, or torn apart by, the scientific community during peer review.
First need to read many articles and then you will get good idea about your idea . So that you will able to write good article. You need to refer more and more to read many articles
